paragraph: Kevin Codfert is the current keyboardist of the band Adagio. He joined the band in 2003, working on the album Underworld. He is the producer of progressive metal band Myrath, which met with the band during Rock Festival in Tunisia on December 2006. Codfert collaborated with Stéphan Forté (guitarist of Adagio) on his solo project, and also with the band Venturia.
On the Edge – BO TF1 composée par Pierre Arnoux (full-length, 2008)
